data.name: Byteconf GraphQL 2020
data.description: Byteconf GraphQL is a 100% free single-day conference with the best GraphQL speakers and teachers in the world. Conferences are great, but flights, hotels, and tickets are expensive, so not everyone can go. Byteconf is streamed on YouTube, for free, so anyone and everyone can attend. RSVP at the linâ€¦
